subject: Olympic Games (2024)
lead_paragraph: On the day that the promoters of Boston’s plan to host the 2024 Summer Olympics finally made their bid public, it emerged that Mayor Martin J. Walsh had signed an agreement to prohibit city employees from speaking negatively about the Olympics.
snippet: On the day that the promoters of Boston’s plan to host the 2024 Summer Olympics finally made their bid public, it emerged that Mayor Martin J. Walsh had signed an agreement to prohibit city employees from speaking negatively about the Olympics.
